mapper.select: -- 배송조회 SELECT SUB_LF.SUB_LF_ID, S.SUBSCRIBE_START_DATE, D.DELIVERY_CODE, LF.LF_NAME, LF.LF_IMG_MAIN, LF.LF_SUB_TYPE, LF.LF_ST_COIN, LF.LF_PR_PRICE FROM DELIVERY D JOIN LFSUBSCRIPTIONLIST SUB_LF on D.SUB_LF_ID = SUB_LF.SUB_LF_ID JOIN SUBSCRIPTION S on SUB_LF.SUBSCRIPTION_ID = S.SUBSCRIPTION_ID JOIN LLIFEFURNITURE LF on SUB_LF.LF_ID = LF.LF_ID WHERE S.M_ID = #{memberId}
